page.syntax: L CreateIndex(TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo, IndexInfo as SQL::IndexInfo)
page.description: Create an index on the specified table in the currently connected database using the TableInfo and IndexInfo specifications.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::CreateIndex() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltSQL::Connection>.CreateIndex( &ltTableDef> as SQL::TableInfo, &ltIndexDef> as SQL::IndexInfo ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). &ltSQL::Connection>A SQL::Connection object. &ltTableDef>A SQL::TableInfo object. &ltIndexDef>A SQL::IndexInfo object.
Description The CreateIndex() method creates an index on the specified table in the currently connected database using the TableDef and IndexDef specifications. Limitations Examples See Also SQL::Connection Object
